member.name: T:UtilityPack.Print
member.summary: Class with static functions for printing in console or gui with different colors based on the type of function used

member.name: F:UtilityPack.Print.IsGUI
member.summary: If true, the messages will not be written to the console but to gui through the function

member.name: F:UtilityPack.Print.IsVerbose
member.summary: If false, no messages will be written when the printing functions are called

member.name: F:UtilityPack.Print.IsDebug
member.summary: If false, no debugging messages will be written when the function is called

member.name: F:UtilityPack.Print.GuiWriteFunction
member.summary: Function called when writing to gui instead of console

member.name: M:UtilityPack.Print.PrintParse(System.Object)
member.summary: Convert the incoming values to be compatible with the terminal
